name: p3backend
description: phonebook made with Node, express, backend practice stuff

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../reactHelsinkiUni/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build/ ../../../p3Backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: "Oheneba Poku-Marboah"
